column3: Latest;Siem Reap: Siem Reap Immigration Police arrested a foreigner in connection with a theft of a motorcycle and tuk-tuk in Sla Kram district on September 4
column5: the foreigner was named Li WEIDONG
column6: a 50-year-old male Chinese national. He is currently being detained at the Siem Reap Municipal Police Inspectorate to make a case for the Siem Reap Provincial Court. (General Department of Immigration)
